task.summary: Default task
initial commit
delete README
add intelliJ and Eclipse project files to scm.
add intelliJ and Eclipse project files to scm.
add intelliJ and Eclipse project files to scm.
rename the readme file
delete readme
add readme
fix typo in REAMDE
navbar gefixed
fix admin view shows now the count of childs.
change the icon for signers and change layout for signer site.
- add chain in validate methods - add error message part in manifest view
- remove close button on confirm views - add popover tooltips for sign form
- change HTML code style in sign form - add popover tooltips in supporter form
- add error handling in save actions in index controller - add a success alert in the manifest view when the signature is saved.
- make the email field in the domain classes unique
- facebook integration for get the email and name data from fb
- add popover info to description in supporter form.
- hide manifest on confirm views when js is not active

- change bootstrap manuel handling to grails plugin - add templates for bootstrap scaffolding see also https://github.com/robfletcher/twitter-bootstrap-scaffolding - remove unused static content from web-app - add bootstrap and fields plugins in build config as runtime dependency - add default EN messages back in property file for admin pages

- change bootstrap manuel handling to grails plugin - add templates for bootstrap scaffolding see also https://github.com/robfletcher/twitter-bootstrap-scaffolding - remove unused static content from web-app - add bootstrap and fields plugins in build config as runtime dependency - add default EN messages back in property file for admin pages

- change bootstrap manuel handling to grails plugin - add templates for bootstrap scaffolding see also https://github.com/robfletcher/twitter-bootstrap-scaffolding - remove unused static content from web-app - add bootstrap and fields plugins in build config as runtime dependency - add default EN messages back in property file for admin pages
- make description field in domain objects of type text - change the views for the description to text areas
- update facebook js show button before add the login handler - remove table headers from the sidebar and the tables in the signers view.

- add email notification support when a supporter or signer was created - add support for a local configuration to setup the mail credentials etc. - mail support is per default deactivated in development mode

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
